medium: Pen and black ink, black chalk, and gray wash on paper laid down on board
title: Cola di Rienzi Surrounded by the People
marks:
Signature, Inscription and Stamp

on back of boa LLC, in pencil: [F. Matania]
description: wedge-shaped mounting; man in armor with outstretched arms riding a white horse led by a banner carrier; very large crowd following and accompanying, including a man in a cap at center foreground carrying a banner and a sword; notes on mat and edges of board
creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
